law.catch_line: License and eligibility requirements for participants in show.
law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 91, sec. 8, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 11, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 106, sec. 2, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 286, sec. 3, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 2, effective March 30, 1990. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec. 8.
